org.cookbookgeeks.webkochbuch.service

Class RecipeHibernateService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cookbookgeeks.webkochbuch.dao.GenericHibernateDao<Recipe,java.lang.Long>
      • org.cookbookgeeks.webkochbuch.dao.RecipeHibernateDao
        • org.cookbookgeeks.webkochbuch.service.RecipeHibernateService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericDao<Recipe,java.lang.Long>, RecipeDao, SearchDao<Recipe,java.lang.Long>, RecipeService

    @Service(value="recipeService")
public class RecipeHibernateService
extends RecipeHibernateDao
implements RecipeService
    Service class for recipe related database operation. This class contains methods that are more business related than in the Daos.
    Author:
    Nils Sommer
